description.english: Finish a stage with Rebecca Quincy.
Defeat Bella Lobo using Teddy Lobo once.
Defeat Bella Lobo using Teddy Lobo 3 times.
Defeat Bella Lobo using Teddy Lobo 5 times.
Do the Kill Route using Dracula 3 times.
Do the Kill Route using Dracula 6 times.
Do the Kill Route using Dracula 9 times.
Finish Livespring High using Cheerleader once.
Finish Livespring High using Cheerleader 3 times.
Finish Livespring High using Cheerleader 5 times.
Finish a stage with Sun-Kissed Dracula using Sunlight 3 times.
Finish a stage with Sun-Kissed Dracula using Sunlight 6 times.
Finish a stage with Sun-Kissed Dracula using Sunlight 10 times.
Finish Dracula's Castle with 4 different characters.
Finish Dracula's Castle with 8 different characters.
Finish Dracula's Castle with 12 different characters.
Use the special attacks of at least 5 different characters at least once.
Use the special attacks of at least 10 different characters at least once.
Use the special attacks of at least 15 different characters at least once.
Finish Murder Room with 4 different characters.
Finish Murder Room with 8 different characters.
Finish Murder Room with 12 different characters.
Reach Wave 70 in Endless Mode with 3 different characters.
Reach Wave 70 in  Endless Mode with 6 different characters.
Reach Wave 70 in  Endless Mode with 9 different characters.
Summon a Familiar for the first time.
Complete one level in Nightmare mode.
Complete three levels with at least 3 different Nightmare Conditions.
Complete five levels with at least 3 different Nightmare Conditions.
